itunes:title: Scott Has Beef with Ilya
title: Scott Has Beef with Ilya
itunes:author: Joe Vulpis & Ilya Feddy
description:
Our friend, Scotty Sire, comes by Lightweights Studios and we chat everything from trying CBD, coming off a bender, signing to a major record label, and getting flagged for hate speech.


Check out Scotty here on his instagram: https://www.instagram.com/scottysire/


Watch our FULL Video Podcast on Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCjmqbxZsoH1YwihrGgU1vPA


Follow our Podcast on Instagram: @lightweightspod https://www.instagram.com/lightweightspod/

Follow Joe on Instagram: @thejoe https://www.instagram.com/thejoe/

Follow Ilya on Instagram: @ilyafeddy https://www.instagram.com/ilyafeddy/

Follow us on Tik Tok @lightweightspod
